page.shortlink: api client api a5 chart palettes namespace

discussion.p: The palettes namespace can be used to create named palettes that can then be used to style charts without having to explicitly set colors and effects. A default "base" palette is created. To create new palettes a A5.chart Palette object is added to the A5.chart.palettes namespace with the name of the property of the palette object being the name it can be referenced by when generating a chart. See *[link:A5.chart.palettes Palette Object]*.
